imagine.description: Generate AI images using Animagine XL 4.0 diffusion model. Supports anime-style prompts with quality tags like masterpiece, high score, absurdres.
imagine.example: .imagine 1girl, blue archive, long hair, masterpiece, absurdres

vision.description: Analyze images using Google Gemini 2.0 vision AI. Detects images from attachments, replies, or URLs and provides detailed analysis.

anime.description: Anime command group. Use subcommands: search, character, recommend.

anime search.description: Search MyAnimeList for anime titles. Shows synopsis, ratings, episodes, studios, and genres with interactive navigation.

anime character.description: Look up anime characters from MyAnimeList. Shows profiles, images, series appearances, and voice actors.

anime recommend.description: Get random anime recommendations with full details including ratings, genres, and synopsis.

manga.description: Manga command group. Use subcommands: search, read, recommend.

manga search.description: Search MangaDex for manga titles. Shows chapters, authors, status, and detailed series information.

manga read.description: Read manga directly in Discord through MangaDex. Navigate chapters with interactive controls.

manga recommend.description: Get random manga recommendations with complete series details and reading stats.

8ball.description: Ask the magic 8-ball a question and receive a mystical yes/no/maybe answer.

memo.description: Memory game - an emoji appears for 2 seconds, then you must react with the correct one. 15 second timeout.

qna.description: Set up Q&A channels for your server. Creates question and answer channels with interactive buttons. Requires Manage Channels.

riddle.description: Riddle system for your server. Use subcommands to setup and post riddles.

riddle setup.description: Configure the riddle answer collection channel. Required before posting riddles. Requires Administrator.

riddle post.description: Post a riddle through a modal interface. Opens dialog for question and answer input.

Action Commands.description:
Roleplay action commands! Use these with @user or 'everyone'.

Available: `.pat`, `.hug`, `.kiss`, `.cuddle`, `.bite`, `.lick`, `.slap`, `.cry`, `.wave`, `.smug`, `.dance`, `.happy`

about.description: Get information about the server and bot including stats and features.

server.description: Display detailed server information and statistics.

pfp.description: Get a user's profile picture in full resolution.

banner.description: Get a user's profile banner image in full resolution.

invite.description: Get the bot's invite link to add it to your server.

perms.description: Check your permissions or another user's permissions in the server.

roles.description: List all roles in the server with member counts.

leaderboard.description: Show the server activity leaderboard with rankings.

reviews.description: View or leave reviews for the server.

log.description: Set or view the moderation log channel. All mod actions will be logged here. Requires Manage Server.

ban.description: Ban a user from the server with an optional reason. Requires Ban Members.

unban.description: Unban a user from the server by their user ID. Requires Ban Members.

timeout.description: Timeout a user for a specified duration (e.g., 10m, 1h, 1d). Requires Moderate Members.

untimeout.description: Remove timeout from a user, allowing them to send messages again. Requires Moderate Members.

purge.description: Bulk delete messages from a channel. Requires Manage Messages.

purge user.description: Delete messages from a specific user in the channel. Requires Manage Messages.

purge bot.description: Delete bot messages from the channel. Requires Manage Messages.

pokedex.description: Look up Pokémon info from PokeAPI - stats, types, abilities, evolutions, and artwork. Supports shiny and regional forms.

pt.description: Pokétwo helper commands. Manage collections, shiny hunts, type pings, and quest pings.

pt help.description: Shows help for all Pokétwo commands including collection, shiny hunt, and ping features.

pt config.description: View server configuration for Pokétwo features. Requires Manage Server.

pt config protection.description: Configure shiny and collection protection channels. Requires Manage Server.

pt tp.description: Type Ping - Select Pokémon types (Fire, Water, Electric, etc.) to get pinged when they spawn.

pt qp.description: Quest Ping - Select regions (Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, etc.) to get pinged for quest spawns.

pt shiny.description:
Set your shiny hunt target. Get pinged when it spawns! One target at a time.

`.pt sh <pokemon>` → Set target
`.pt sh` → View current
`.pt sh remove` → Remove

pt collection.description:
Manage your collection watchlist (max 50). Get pinged when any spawn!

`.pt cl add <pokemon>` → Add
`.pt cl remove <pokemon>` → Remove
`.pt cl` → View
`.pt cl clear` → Clear all

redirect.description: Set channels for quest mission redirects. Requires Manage Channels or Anya Manager role.

profile.description: View your quest profile with level, XP, and stats.

inventory.description: View your quest inventory with collected items and rewards.

balance.description: Check your quest balance and star points.

shop.description: Browse and purchase items from the quest shop.

quest.description: Main quest command group. View active quests and settings.

quest roles.description: Configure roles that can create and manage quests. Requires Administrator.

quest create.description: Create a new quest with custom objectives and rewards.

quest delete.description: Delete an existing quest by ID.

ping.description: Check Discord API latency with color-coded response (green/yellow/red).

uptime.description: Display how long the bot has been running.

memory.description: Show current bot memory usage for performance monitoring.

credit.description: Show bot credits and developer information.

ticket.description: Support ticket system. Create and manage tickets in your server.

ticket create.description: Create a new support ticket panel in a specified channel.

ticket activate.description: Activate the ticket system for your server.

ticket edit.description: Edit an existing ticket panel message.
